00020 /** \file
00021  \brief gps communications
00022  */
00023 #ifdef HAVE_GPSD
00024 
00025 #ifndef __GPSCOMM_H
00026 #define __GPSCOMM_H
00027 
00028 #include <gps.h>
00029 
00030 /// Open the gps
00031 /** \param server server running gpsd
00032  \param port port gpsd is listening on
00033  \return a gps_data_t, or NULL on failure
00034  */
00035 struct gps_data_t *opengps(char *server, char *port);
00036 
00037 /// Close the gps
00038 void closegps(struct gps_data_t *g);
00039 
00040 /// Get the current position
00041 /** \param g the gps_data_t returned from opengps
00042  \param lat pointer to where you want the latitude stored
00043  \param lon pointer to where you want the longitude stored
00044  \param alt pointer to where you want the altitude stored
00045  \param course pointer to where you want the course stored
00046  \param speed pointer to where you want the speed stored
00047  \param gpstime pointer to where you want the gpstime stored
00048  \return -1 for no workable co-ordinates, 0 for lat,lon, and 1 for lat,lon,alt
00049  */
00050 int getgpsposition(struct gps_data_t *g, double *lat, double *lon, double *alt, double *speed, double *course, double *gpstime);
00051 
00052 
00053 #endif //__GPSCOMM_H
00054 
00055 #endif //HAVE_GPSD
